page.title: 12Leisure Centre S.on A.
page.content: Recreation. The Leisure Centre is between the River Avon and the Bridgeway.It provides the following facilities:4 squash courts,a 33.3m x 12.5m swimming pool,a 12.5m x 11m learner pool,a sauna suite (with 2 sauna cabins,3 U.V.A. sunbeds and fitted lounge area) a beauty studio, and a cafe next to a lounge and pool observation area.In 1984 180000 members of the public,38000 school children,and 31200 club members used the Centre;of these 35000 used the squash courts,12000 the sauna,and 3500 the sunbeds.The total income for 1984 was Â£244000 but the Government had to subsidise the Centre by a further Â£350000 to keep it running.The main costs are energy,maintenance and employing the 42 part-time and 12 full-time staff who run the Centre and the other attached activities.
